thinking wait write shared going parents even ask everything read - glimpse facebook page negative negative 3 adult child problems signs e-mail love hugs also says suicide option also right i want stick say missed work surgery got staph infection missed work protect clients seem like one even cares anymore why even bother end one week ago one week ago i can to this board to offer hope to others having been there so many times before but now i am right back in the depths of darkness i found out a friend was going through a huge life change and was leaving me behind i got into therapy and thought i was doing ok hours passed and i could not breathe so i took some medication too much medication i slept it off the next day i called the doctor i could not breathe before the appointment so i took some benzos too many benzos i thought i was ok to drive i must have been wrong i was arrested for ovi i lost my license my job my freedom but most importantly my good name my pdoc basically told me i am a piece of shit and that i am helpless and i finally agree i have a few things left to do and then i clock-out for good i have lived my life to the fullest and there is not anything left i thought this would be harder but all i feel is peace
